snippet: Laurie Goldberg of the cable channel TLC has deftly handled a flurry of reality-show crises surrounding series like “All-American Muslim” and “Jon & Kate Plus 8.”
abstract: Laurie Goldberg, head of public relations for cable channel TLC, has deftly handled a flurry of reality-show crises surrounding series like All-American Muslim and Jon & Kate Plus 8; she refuses to make big stories bigger, thereby keeping channel's brand mostly unblemished, and forges close friendships with TV show cast members.
lead_paragraph: Laurie Goldberg of the cable channel TLC has deftly handled a flurry of reality-show crises surrounding series like “All-American Muslim” and “Jon & Kate Plus 8.”

headline.seo: For Laurie Goldberg of TLC, ‘No Comment’ Is an Art
headline.main: In Speaking for TLC, the Least Said Is Best
headline.print_headline: In Speaking for TLC, The Least Said Is Best
